description: <p>Consultants in Psychiatry – Various posts<br />Jersey General Hospital St Helier, Jersey<br />£87,624 - £159,455 (dependent on experience)<br /><br />Come to a place that is better for you, as well as your patients. Jersey’s Health and Community Services Department runs the Island’s integrated, taxation-funded health and care system that is largely free at the point of delivery.<br /><br />Jersey has started a comprehensive programme to transform health social care. This change is supported with significant investment in Community and acute hospital services. Funding has been secured to build a new 300 bed General Hospital that is in the early stages of planning. A strategic programme for a comprehensive Mental Health Services campus is well underway.<br /><br />We currently have 4 posts available;<br />Consultant in Older Age Psychiatry – 2 posts<br />Consultant in General Adult Psychiatry<br />Consultant with a special interest in Neurodiversity Psychiatry<br /><br />All the components of a health and social care system are here to work with, and in an environment where there is a greater and closer interaction with political processes than in the UK, this is an excellent opportunity to be part of developing a genuinely integrated system.<br /><br />With great weather, beautiful beaches and surroundings, you will enjoy a better quality of life in our island community. In addition, with an easy commute, more time for yourself too.<br /><br />If you would like to discuss the post informally please contact Dr Miguel Garcia-Alcaraz, Head of Mental Health (01534) MG.Alcaraz@health.gov.je</p>
title: Consultants in Psychiatry – Various posts
